languages.text: "На этой птичке чего только нет. Большая часть техники мертва, но и рабочие образцы встречаются. Мы месяца два расчищали колодец, а дня три назад закончили и нашли такую штуку — странная на вид, но вроде выглядит исправной". {n}Рета немного оживляется.{/n} "Может, Ваша Светлость пожелает приобрести у нас компонент этот? У вас вон и корабль имеется, найдется, куда ее пристроить..."

"This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."
languages.original_text: "На этой птичке чего только нет. Большая часть техники мертва, но и рабочие образцы встречаются. Мы месяца два расчищали колодец, а дня три назад закончили и нашли такую штуку — странная на вид, но вроде выглядит исправной". {n}Рета немного оживляется.{/n} "Может, Ваша Светлость пожелает приобрести у нас компонент этот? У вас вон и корабль имеется, найдется, куда ее пристроить..."

traits.locale_text: "They would do, yes. This little bird got all kinds of knickknacks. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking, but sort of like a plasma battery. It's still got some charge in it too. Maybe that's what your augur picked up."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "They would do, yes. This little bird got all kinds of knickknacks. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking, but sort of like a plasma battery. It's still got some charge in it too. Maybe that's what your augur picked up."

We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “这只小鸟会发出各种各样叮叮当当的声音。绝大部分技术设备都是坏的，不过我们偶尔也会找到能用的部件。我们刚刚花了整整两个月的时间，清理我们发现的这个竖井。老实说，我们三天前才刚把活干完，找到了这个东西东西。虽然它看起来有点怪，但还能用。”{n}蕾塔的表情变得明快了些。{/n}“或许您愿意从我们手里买走这个零件，大人？我敢打赌，这玩意儿肯定能在您的大船上派上大用场……”
languages.original_text: "This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."

traits.locale_text: “应该没扫描错，是啊，那只小鸟会吹出各种各样的口哨声。绝大部分的技术设备都是坏的，不过我们偶尔也会找到能用的部件。我们刚刚花了整整两个月的时间，清理我们发现的这个竖井。老实说，我们三天前才刚把活干完，才找到了这个东西。虽然它看起来有点怪，但应该是等离子电池，里面还有电。说不定您的飞船扫描到的东西就是这个。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Este pajarito tiene todo tipo de parafernalia. La mayor parte de su tecnología no sirve, pero, de vez en cuando, encontramos alguna pieza en buen estado. Pasamos dos meses enteros despejando un conducto que encontramos (terminamos hace tres días, de hecho) y encontramos este trasto. Es un poco raro, pero funciona». {n}La expresión de Reta se anima.{/n} «¿Le interesaría comprar el componente, mi{mf|lord|lady}? Seguro que en una nave como la suya le pueden dar buen uso...».
languages.original_text: "This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."

traits.locale_text: «No me extraña. Este pajarito tiene todo tipo de parafernalia. La mayor parte de su tecnología no sirve, pero, de vez en cuando, encontramos alguna pieza en buen estado. Pasamos dos meses enteros despejando un conducto que encontramos (terminamos hace tres días, de hecho) y encontramos algo que parece una especie de batería de plasma muy peculiar. Aún tiene un poco de energía, además. Puede que eso fuera lo que han detectado sus augures».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「この小さな鳥は、色んな種類の鐘と笛を持ってるんです。ほとんどの技術は死でしまいましたけど、たまに動く部品を見つけることがあります。私達は見つけこのたシャフトを、2ヶ月まるまるかけて掃除してきて、実はつい3日前に掃除が終わったのです。それで見つけたんですよ。見た目は少し変だけど、まだ動いてるコレを」{n}レタの表情が少し明るくなる。{/n}「もしかして陛下、この部品を買いたいとは思いませんか？あなた様のあの大きな船なら、きっと使い道がいくつもあるのではないでしょうか…」
languages.original_text: "This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."

traits.locale_text: 「この小さな鳥は、色んな種類の鐘と笛を持ってるんです。ほとんどの技術は死でしまいましたけど、たまに動く部品を見つけることがあります。私達は見つけこのたシャフトを、2ヶ月まるまるかけて掃除してきて、実はつい3日前に掃除が終わったのです。それで見つけたんですよ。見た目は少し変だけど、まだ動いてるコレを」{n}レタの表情が少し明るくなる。{/n}「もしかして陛下、この部品を買いたいとは思いませんか？あなた様のあの大きな船なら、きっと使い道がいくつもあるのではないでしょうか…」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Dieser kleine Vogel hat allerlei Glocken und Pfeifen. Der Großteil der Technologien ist tot, aber ab und an finden wir funktionierende Geräte. Wir haben zwei ganze Monate gebraucht, um diesen Schacht zu räumen, den wir gefunden haben ... sind erst vor drei Tagen damit fertiggeworden ... und wir haben dieses Ding gefunden, sieht komisch aus, funktioniert aber noch." {n}Retas Miene hellt sich ein wenig auf.{/n} "Vielleicht möchte uns {mf|Eure Lordschaft|Eure Ladyschaft} diese Komponente abkaufen? Ich wette, Euer riesiges Schiff hätte gewiss Verwendung dafür ..."
languages.original_text: "This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser kleine Vogel hat allerlei Glocken und Pfeifen. Der Großteil der Technologien ist tot, aber ab und an finden wir funktionierende Geräte. Wir haben zwei ganze Monate gebraucht, um diesen Schacht zu räumen, den wir gefunden haben ... sind erst vor drei Tagen damit fertiggeworden ... und wir haben dieses Ding gefunden, sieht komisch aus, funktioniert aber noch. {n}Retas Miene hellt sich ein wenig auf.{/n} "Vielleicht möchte uns {mf|Eure Lordschaft|Eure Ladyschaft} diese Komponente abkaufen? Ich wette, Euer riesiges Schiff hätte gewiss Verwendung dafür ..."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Ce coucou cache encore tout un tas de secrets. La plupart des appareils sont hors service, mais il nous arrive de dénicher des pièces en état de marche. Après plus de deux mois de boulot, on vient tout juste de terminer le démantèlement de ce puits où on a trouvé ce truc un peu bizarre, mais encore fonctionnel. » {n}Le visage de Réta s'illumine légèrement.{/n} « Que diriez-vous de nous l'acheter, Votre Seigneurie ? Avec un engin comme le vôtre, je parie qu'il pourrait vous être utile... »
languages.original_text: "This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."

traits.locale_text: « Pas étonnant. Ce coucou cache encore tout un tas de secrets. La plupart des appareils sont hors service, mais il nous arrive de trouver des pièces en état de marche. Après plus de deux mois de boulot, on vient tout juste de terminer le démantèlement de ce puits où on a trouvé ce truc un peu bizarre. On dirait une batterie à plasma. Elle est pas totalement à sec, en plus. C'est peut-être ça que vos augures ont détecté. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Şu küçük serçemizde de yok yok. Teknolojik açıdan çoğu nalları dikmiş ama arada çalışan parçalar çıkıyor. İki koca ay bulduğumuz bir bacayı temizledik durduk, hatta daha üç gün önce yeni bitirdik ve biraz acayip görüşlü ama hâlâ çalışan bir şey bulduk." {n}Reta'nın yüzü aydınlanıyor.{/n} "Acaba {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri bu parçayı bizden satın almak ister miydi? Eminim koca geminizde çok işinize yarar..."
languages.original_text: "This little bird's got all kinds of bells and whistles. Most of the tech is dead, but we do find working pieces now and again. We spent two whole months clearing out this shaft we found — finished just three days ago, actually — and we found this thing, a bit weird-looking but still functional." {n}Reta's expression brightens a little.{/n} "Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} would like to buy this component from us? I'll bet that big ship you've got could get plenty of use out of it..."
